info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 25 at 8:37AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CROCKETT COUNTY... At 836 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Ft Lancaster, or 17 miles east of Sheffield, moving east at 25 mph along Interstate 10. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Interstate 10...west of Ozona. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 338 and 361. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
